TextLibrary.Text: Good work! You've passed the qualifier. If you do well, you will only have three more rounds ahead of you.
Good work! You've passed the qualifier. If you do well, you will only have three more rounds ahead of you.
Did you manage to find anything out about my next opponent?
Did you manage to find anything out about my next opponent?
Yes, he goes by the name "Dr. Horrible". His specialty is Scientific equipment in combat.
Yes, he goes by the name "Dr. Horrible". His specialty is Scientific equipment in combat.
Scientific equipment? What exactly do you mean?
Scientific equipment? Isn't everything we use scientific?
You can expect droids, drones and other tricks from him. That's what I meant.
Well, yes, but I meant droids, drones and other such tricks.
When I took down the first ship, some people sent me a nasty e-mail. Any idea why?
When I took down the first ship, some people sent me a nasty e-mail. Any idea why?
While you aren't killing anyone out there, you are making representatives of different factions look bad.
While you aren't killing anyone out there, you are making representatives of different factions look bad.
Understood. I may make some enemies as a result. I'll head out to the second round then.
Understood. I may make some enemies as a result. I'll head out to the second round then.
